word:
How was it with Ephesus? she knew not the time of her visitation. She did not heed the solemn admonitions of God. She did not maintain a vital connection with Christ, and grievous wolves entered in, and spared not the flock. That church, once beloved of God, that might have sent her 
                                                                           1022
bright rays amid the moral darkness to enlighten many souls, permitted her light to go out.
